description_html: SIENA further expands their curated product portfolio by launching 52nd Street & Straight Path, a 36-ounce SDN broadloom collection. As the debut to Siena’s “Going Home Series", 52nd Street, an organic-lustered loop and its coordinate Straight Path, an elegant tip-shear with a wool-silk monochromatic texture; reference hand-made carpets of the past while maintaining a contemporary nod. Both styles are available in 13 colorways.
